Albemarle County VA currently uses a product called CityView.  Here is their website http://www.msgovern.com/software/cityview/
We are much larger that 7,000 but I think it fits for almost any size municipality.

author: Don Buczek
text:
I work for a city with a population of 7,000.  We currently do not have code enforcement software but are looking into something that would work well for a small community and small budget.  We would use the software for tracking inspections, producing letters and issuing permits.
Do you have any suggestions?  Do you have software that works well for you?
Thank you!
title: Code Enforcement Software?
